item.title: SpringBoot应用和Rust应用的Dockerfile最佳实践
item.description: 记录spring boot和rust项目的Dockerfile的最佳实践.

item.title: Spring FactoryBean and ContextAware
item.description: FactoryBean 一句话就是FactoryBean用于返回其他对象实例的,而不是自身类型的实例. 例如: public class Tool { private int id; // standard constructors, getters and setters } public class ToolFactory implements FactoryBean<Tool> { private int factoryId; private int toolId; @Override public Tool getObject() throws Exception { return new Tool(toolId); } @Override public Class<?> getObjectType() { return Tool.class; } @Override public boolean isSingleton() { return false; } // standard setters and getters } 注册Tool: <!-- factorybean-spring-ctx.xml --> <beans> <bean id="tool" class="com.baeldung.factorybean.ToolFactory"> <property name="factoryId" value="9090"/> <property

item.title: Spring Boot Notes
item.description: 一些容易忘记的spring boot知识要点. 注意,.yaml和.yml文件没任何区别. 配置 SpringBootApplication注解 @SpringBootApplication <=等价=> @Configuration @ComponentScan @EnableAutoConfiguration 自动配置 spring的自动配置依赖以下注解: 配置文件 任何时候硬编码的配置
